entities.description: The respondent's best estimate of the number of days they smoked part or all of a cigarette during the past 30 days.
The average number of cigarettes smoked per day by the respondent on the days they smoked during the past 30 days.
Indicates whether the respondent most often smoked menthol cigarettes during the past 30 days.
Indicates if the respondent smoked part or all of a roll-your-own cigarette during the past 30 days.

relationships.description: Connects the respondent to their best estimate of the number of days they smoked part or all of a cigarette in the past 30 days.
Links the respondent to the average number of cigarettes they smoked per day on the days they smoked during the past 30 days.
Connects the respondent to whether they smoked menthol cigarettes most often during the past 30 days.
Indicates if the respondent smoked part or all of a roll-your-own cigarette during the past 30 days.
